candidates.title: Update dependencies - specifically, tokio, prost, and tonic
candidates.body:
I've updated three dependencies as part of this PR - tokio, prost, and tonic.

tokio has recently reached 1.0, and since it's a pretty core library, and differing versions can be problematic across crates, I think updating it to 1.0 ASAP makes the most sense - especially since they have some strong semver guarantees post 1.0.

tonic being updated pulls in the 1.0 of tokio, and also the updated prost 0.7.

I've run all of the integration tests locally and everything passes.

candidates.title: Add support for Slash GraphQL service over gRPC
Implement get_txn_context for all transaction variants
Replace deprecated failure create with anyhow and thiserror
Assigned uids from mutation readme example
Expose IClient trait and ClientVariant as public.
candidates.body: dgraph-tonic clients can use it in structures or as function parameters

candidates.title: Upsert commit
candidates.body: Client can control if upser operation is committed - https://github.com/selmeci/dgraph-tonic/issues/7
